The maintenance process provides for evaluating the effect on software assurance from changes made to the software during maintenance and maintaining appropriate evidence for software assurance. It includes a documented process for patching and remediating software, detecting and removing or inactivating unauthorized and malicious software, and a process for informing an acquirer or interface partner of notification and remediation mechanisms. Remediation of vulnerabilities is prioritized based on a variety of factors, including risk.
